summary: "Juno" is a 2007 American movie about a teenager, Juno (played by Elliot Page), who gets pregnant unexpectedly. She deals with adult problems as she decides what to do. The film was well-liked and won an Academy Award for its story. It made a lot of money and was praised by many critics. Some people liked how it handled the topic of abortion, while others didn't. The movie was shot in Vancouver and became very popular.
title: Juno (film)
